          <title>
            <string language="en">Distillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Destillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distillazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσταξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Destilación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up to separate water from a blue ink solution by distillation. This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Installation zum 
unterschiedlichen Wasser von einer blaue Tinte Lösung durch 
Destillation. Dieses kann als beschriftende Übung verwendet 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation à 
l'eau séparée d'une solution d'encre bleue par distillation. 
Ceci peut être utilisé comme exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação à 
água separada de uma solução da tinta azul pelo distillation. 
Isto pode ser usado como um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto ad 
acqua separata da una soluzione dell'inchiostro blu tramite 
distillazione. Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione 
identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση για να 
χωρίσει το ύδωρ από μια λύση μπλε μελανιού από την απόσταξη. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición al 
agua separada de una solución de la tinta azul por la destilación. 
Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Destillation</string>
          </keyword>
